p: Descriptive statistics were calculated for demographic, clinical, and laboratory characteristics of cases. Mean and standard deviation (SD) were recorded for normally distributed variables, and the median and interquartile range (IQR) for non-normally distributed variables. The number and percentage were recorded for categorical variables. Differences between groups were analyzed using the Fisher’s exact test, or Mann–Whitney test, as appropriate. A p-value of < 0.05 was considered to indicate significance. Epi Info computer software version 7 was used for statistical analysis.
